Title: Python Developer
Description: Looking for a backend Python Developer skilled in Flask, REST APIs, and PostgreSQL. Familiarity with Git and Agile practices required.

Title: Data Analyst
Description: Analyze data using SQL, Excel, and Power BI. Work with large datasets, generate insights, and create dashboards.

Title: Machine Learning Intern
Description: Assist with ML model development using Python, scikit-learn, and pandas. Understanding of data preprocessing and model evaluation.

Title: Web Developer Intern
Description: Build responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Integrate with backend APIs and manage Git repositories.

Title: AI Research Assistant
Description: Research and prototype deep learning models using TensorFlow or PyTorch. Support experiments and document findings.
